subject: Officiating (Sports)
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: A former referee involved in Italy’s controversial elimination from the 2002 World Cup was caught at Kennedy Airport with 10 bags of heroin attached to his body, federal prosecutors said Tuesday.
